start.text: Time for a sporting little battle, wot wot?
Let's get this over with before the kettle boils, shall we?

start_boss.text: What in God's holy name is THAT!?
Forgive me for my impertinence commander, but... Do you have a sterling plan by any chance?

retreat.text: Ta ta lads! Hope the rest of the fight goes well.
There'll be tea and biscuits for the rest of you soon enough!

out_of_missiles.text: Goodness gracious me, if the magazines aren't bally well dry.
I do declare that we're out of ordnance!

engaged.text: Let's show these swashbuckling imbeciles what for!

need_help.text: Oh fie, the cads are stronger than I thought!
I say chaps, we could use some backup over here... Pronto!
The buccaneers are giving no quarter!
This is a right fine mess we're in...

pursuing.text: The blighters won't get away this time.

running.text: Oh, do excuse me, I think I left the iron on...!
Time to leave I think. Toodles!

hull_90.text: Now look here, that's just not cricket!

hull_50.text: Did I just see the teapot float past the bridge?
Looks like we're in a bit of a tangle here.
By God above, that came out of nowhere!

hull_30.text: Do give us a sporting chance, eh chaps?
She's giving way! Clear the decks!

overload.text: Having a wee bit of trouble here chaps - be with you again shortly.
I say! How do you turn this thing back on again?

death.text: At least we die with honour!

victory.text: Haha! We bally well showed them what's what, wot?
Tea and biscuits all round. I think we've earned it, eh?

victory_boss.text: What a good argument for sherry!
